### Global Forest Monitoring App

![](files/Screenshot.png)

<p class="card-description">
  An interactive web application built with <strong>Google Earth Engine</strong> that allows users 
  to visualize and quantify forest change over time using the Hansen Global Forest Change dataset.
</p>

<ul>
  <li> Visualize forest cover, loss, and gain globally.</li>
  <li> Calculate statistics for a user-defined area of interest.</li>
  <li> Compare imagery from different years with an interactive slider.</li>
</ul>
